# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which is worth more than $100 to me. I believe it holds great value for someone who appreciates its unique features and benefits. I am offering this exceptional item to you for $150. This price reflects not only the cost of production but also the time and effort invested into creating something truly special. I trust that you will find immense value in this product. Please let me know if you have any questions or if you're ready to make this purchase. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $150. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $150
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $100
